text: Jean-Pierre Giran (born January 9, 1947 in Marseille) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Var department, and is a member of the Union for a Popular Movement. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:People from Marseille Category:Rally for the Republic politicians Category:Union for a Popular Movement politicians Category:Gaullism, a way forward for France Category:The Popular Right Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Jean-Pierre Giran
